Authors: T Ken, Y Sunichi, U Toshiro, T Tomoo...
Title: Endoscopic Removal Of Foreign Bodies In The Mentally And Physically Handicapped
Comments: Case report of endoscopic management of multiple ingestions. Severe mental and physical impairment.

Authors: Goldman, R. D.; Schachter, P.; Katz, M.; Bilik, R.; Avigad, I.
Title: A Bizarre Bezoar: Case Report And Review Of The Literature
Comments: 16 year old female. Toilet paper ingestion as part of diet. Study reports as bezoar.

Title: A Review Of Gastrointestinal Foreign Bodies
Comments: Mixed cohort of accidental ingestion, deliberate insertion and deliberate ingestion of objects. Deliberate "ingestion in 11" patients.

Authors: Rodríguez-Hermosa, J. I.; Codina-Cazador, A.; Ruiz, B.; Sirvent, J. M.; Roig, J.; Farrés, R.
Title: Management Of Foreign Bodies In The Rectum
Publication Title: Colorectal Disease : The Official Journal Of The Association Of Coloproctology Of Great Britain And Ireland
Comments: Intentionally ingested in 6 cases. Includes swallowed nails, keys, spanners, batteries in population of prisoners and intoxicated people.

Title: An Unusual Case Of Foreign Body In The Anterior Abdominal Wall
Comments: Author not sure if ingested or inserted. No explicit mention of ingestion, but possible.

Authors: Naji, Hussein; Isacson, Daniel; Svensson, Jan F.; Wester, Tomas
Title: Bowel Injuries Caused By Ingestion Of Multiple Magnets In Children: A Growing Hazard
Comments: 12 year old potentially intentional ingestion whilst playing a game with her brother.

Authors: Frei-Lanter, Cornelia M.; Vavricka, Stephan R.; Kruger, Tillmann H. C.; Tutuian, Radu; Geier, Andreas; Bauerfeind, Peter; Krones, Tanja; Fried, Michael; Frei, Pascal
Title: Endoscopy For Repeatedly Ingested Sharp Foreign Bodies In Patients With Borderline Personality Disorder: An International Survey

Authors: Yildiz, I; Koca, Ys; Avsar, G; Barut, I
Title: Tendency To Ingest Foreign Bodies In Mentally Retarded Patients: A Case With Ileal Perforation Caused By The Ingestion Of A Teaspoon

Authors: Peixoto, A.; Pereira, P.; Macedo, G.
Title: Gastrointestinal: Voluntary Padlock Ingestion
Comments: Single case of intentional padlock ingestion in female with cerebral palsy and 'self-destructive behaviour'

Authors: Varik, Roma; Shubha, Attibele Mahadevaiah; Das, Kanishka
Title: Multiple Atypical Esophageal Foreign Bodies In An Infant
Publication Title: Journal Of Indian Association Of Pediatric Surgeons
Comments: Homocidal intent. 4-month female with 4 open safety pins and midthoracic coin.

Authors: Gouda, Mahmoud; Elkholi, Ayman; Tranah, Thomas H.; Shawcross, Debbie L.
Title: An 18-Year-Old Girl With Retrosternal Burning Discomfort: A Bitter Pill To Swallow
Comments: Case report. 18F intentional ingestion of multiple objects and caustic chemical.

Authors: Norton-Gregory, Ashley A.; Kulkarni, Naveen M.; O'Connor, Stacy D.; Budovec, Joseph J.; Zorn, Adam P.; Desouches, Stephane L.
Title: Gastrointestinal System Foreign Bodies.
Comments: Single centre, retrospective database study. Includes intentional ingestion, but data on these not easy to find.
